hadiths.text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by Abu Dharr through a different chain of narrators. In this version the transmitter mentioned the Prophet(ﷺ) in the middle of the tradition

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي إِمَاطَةِ الأَذَى عَنِ الطَّرِيقِ
chapter.eng-name: Removing harmful things from the road
